AvailableTests.heading: Available tests

Community.heading: Community
Community.descriptionFull: Follow us on social media to get daily quizzes, exercises, and puzzles to keep your mind sharp

item1.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the program?
item1.answer: We are confident that you will see the value and benefits of myIQ, but if you are not satisfied or encounter technical issues, you may be eligible for a refund. Please see our Refund Policy for more details.

item2.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
item2.answer: Cancellation is simple and takes only a few minutes. Visit our Help Center and follow the instructions. You will retain access until the end of the current billing period.

item3.question: How long does the IQ test take?
item3.answer: Our IQ test takes up to 20 minutes. Each test must be completed in one session and cannot be paused, as this ensures the most accurate results. Please schedule uninterrupted time before starting any test.

item4.question: Can I retake the tests?
item4.answer: Yes! You can retake tests after completing the recommended learning modules to track your progress and improvement over time.

item5.question: Can I access myIQ on multiple devices?
item5.answer: Yes! Your subscription works on all devices—smartphones, tablets, and computers. Your progress automatically syncs wherever you log in.

item6.question: Is my data secure?
item6.answer: We take your privacy seriously. Your data is securely stored and handled in accordance with all applicable laws. Data is encrypted using bank-level security, and we never share your personal information with third parties. Your payment information is processed according to PCI-DSS industry standards. Learn more in our Privacy Policy.
